Text: Re Valero RFP Issued June pst Daren Thank you for the proposal I look forward to discussing this further with you over the next week Dave Farmer Daren J To DarenJFarmer cc enroncom Subject Valero RFP Issued June PM David In response to the RFP you issued on June for electric power and natural gas supplies Enron would like to present the following offers for your gas supply in Texas For deliveries to the Corpus plant Mmbtu per day priced at Inside FERC Houston Ship Channel less for a term of one year or Mmbtu per day priced at Inside FERC Houston Ship Channel less for a term of two years For deliveries to the Houston plant Mmbtu per day priced at Inside FERC Houston Ship Channel less for a term of one year or Mmbtu per day priced at Inside FERC Houston Ship Channel flat for a term of two years For deliveries to the Clear Lake Plant Mmbtu per day priced at Inside FERC Houston Ship Channel less for a term of one year or Mmbtu per day priced at Inside FERC Houston Ship Channel flat for a term of two years Under this offer Enron reserves the right to serve the plants from any of the pipelines listed under Appendix D Table of your RFP HPL EPGTT Kinder Morgan I appreciate your review of this offer Please contact me at with any questions or comments Thank You Daren Farmer Enron North America Ph Fax Email
